includedIn.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer
includedIn.synopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.

includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.
